data.Name: Caroline vanBruinswaardt
data.staff_bio: Caroline has been advocating for children with special needs in the Special Education System for 6 years.  She has completed the Federation for Children with Special Needs Advocacy Training Institute, as well as other workshops offered by the Federation.  Caroline is the 2008 Barbara Willensky Gopen Fellow.  For her fellowship year she is studying meaningful social inclusion for children with hidden disabilities.  Her project is a hidden disability awareness program to be piloted in the third grade classes in Medway Public Schools.
data.staff_ed:
B.Comm, Management Information Systems, McGill University
M.H.Sc., Health Administration, University of Toronto
